get.summary: List feedback comments on article translation
get.description: This API lists a particular number of comments received on a translation of an article, based on the limit defined.

parameters.name: createdTimeRange
parameters.description: Key that filters comments created within a specific date and time range. Enter the dates in the ISO date format of 'yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:ss.SSSZ,yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:ss.SSSZ'

schema.description: Key that filters comments created within a specific date and time range. Enter the dates in the ISO date format of 'yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:ss.SSSZ,yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:ss.SSSZ'

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Key that sorts the comments based on a specific attribute: createdTime. To sort the comments in descending order, append a '-' before the value

schema.description: Key that sorts the comments based on a specific attribute: createdTime. To sort the comments in descending order, append a '-' before the value

post.summary: Create a Feedback for article translation
post.description: This API create a feedback for a translation of an article

get.description: This API fetches the details of a particular feedback comment.

delete.description: This API deletes a particular feedback comment from an article.

patch.summary: Update resolution status of feedback comment
patch.description: This API updates the resolution status of a feedback comment received for an article.

get.description: This API lists a particular number of comments received on an article, based on the limit defined.

parameters.name: rootCategoryIds
parameters.description: Filter article feedback comments based on rootCategoryIds

schema.description: Filter article feedback comments based on rootCategoryIds

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Key that sorts the comments based on a specific attribute: createdTime. To sort the comments in descending order, append a '-' before the value.

schema.description: Key that sorts the comments based on a specific attribute: createdTime. To sort the comments in descending order, append a '-' before the value.

parameters.name: departmentIds
parameters.description: Filter article feedback comments based on department ids

schema.description: Filter article feedback comments based on department ids

parameters.name: timeRange
parameters.description: Key that filters comments created within a specific date and time range. Enter the time limit in the formats of !@LAST_24_HRS,@! !@LAST_7_DAYS,@! !@LAST_30_DAYS,@! !@LAST_365_DAYS@! and !@yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:ss.SSSZ,yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:ss.SSSZ@!. Default value : LAST_7_DAYS.

schema.description: Key that filters comments created within a specific date and time range. Enter the time limit in the formats of !@LAST_24_HRS,@! !@LAST_7_DAYS,@! !@LAST_30_DAYS,@! !@LAST_365_DAYS@! and !@yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:ss.SSSZ,yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:ss.SSSZ@!. Default value : LAST_7_DAYS.

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Key that sorts the feedbacks based on a specific attribute: !@createdTime@!. Add - to sort descending

schema.description: Key that sorts the feedbacks based on a specific attribute: !@createdTime@!. Add - to sort descending

post.description: This API adds a feedback comment as a ticket in your help desk portal and assigns it to the author of the article.

x-custom-parameters-attributes.descrption: Feedback content shared for the translation of an article
Resolution status of the feedback comment. Values allowed are: !@UNRESOLVED@! and !@RESOLVED@!.

value.content: Please add pricing details in tabular columns
Please add pricing details in tabular columns

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Number of comments to list. Default value is 10.

schema.description: Number of comments to list. Default value is 10.

from.name: from
from.description: Index number, starting from which the comments must be fetched. Default value is 1.

schema.description: Index number, starting from which the comments must be fetched. Default value is 1.

locale.name: locale
locale.description: Locale of an article translation in which feedback comments to be fetched

schema.description: Locale of an article translation in which feedback comments to be fetched

content.description: Feedback content shared for the translation of an article

departmentId.description: ID of the department in which the ticket must be created. If you do not pass a value for this key, the departmentId value set in the knowledge base category preferences is considered. If no departmentId value is set in these preferences either, the ticket is created in any of the departments associated with the KB category to which the article belongs.

assigneeId.description: ID of the user to whom the ticket must be assigned. If you do not pass a value for this key, the assigneeId value set in the knowledge base category preferences is considered. If no assigneeId value is set in the preferences either, the ticket is left unassigned.

status.description: Resolution status of the feedback comment. Values allowed are: !@UNRESOLVED@! and !@RESOLVED@!.
